si.title: Man arrested trying to sell 10kg of ambergris for Rs. 200 million
body_lines: 'ඇම්බර්ග්රිස්' කිලෝග්රෑම් 10 ක් විකිණීමට උත්සාහ කරන බවට ගණන් බලා ඇති බවට පත්ව ඇති බවට පත්ව ඇති අයෙකු අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ.. මිලියන 200 ක් බව පොලිසිය පවසයි.
The suspect has been arrested by officers of the Western Province (North) Police Crimes Division and the Sri Lanka Air Force in the Ragama area.

Ambergris, also called grey amber or whale vomit, is created by the bile duct of the sperm whale and is often referred to as “floating gold” due to the immense price it fetches in the international market for its use in luxury perfumes.

ta.title: மனிதன் 10 கிலோ அம்பெர்கிரிஸை ரூ.. 200 million
body_lines: 10 கிலோகிராம் ‘அம்பெர்கிரிஸ்’ விற்க முயன்றதாகக் கூறப்படும் போது ஒரு நபர் கைது செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளார். 200 million, police said.
The suspect has been arrested by officers of the Western Province (North) Police Crimes Division and the Sri Lanka Air Force in the Ragama area.

Ambergris, also called grey amber or whale vomit, is created by the bile duct of the sperm whale and is often referred to as “floating gold” due to the immense price it fetches in the international market for its use in luxury perfumes.
